Producer: Lauren Bates, Zoey Gold, Ingi Hrafn Hilmarsson, Shane Donahue, Kellen Witschen
Production Co: Monumental Productions, Blind Hummingbird Productions, Black Feather Creative, Teenager
Genre: Horror, Fantasy, Drama, Mystery & Thriller, Romance
Synopsis: Belle works on the family farm and cares for her father after he falls severely ill. Desperate to save him, she journeys in search of a mythical rose believed to be a cure. She must surrender herself as a prisoner to a vicious beast as payment for the rose. Battling the beast’s spell and the two toxic relationships in her life, Belle’s true journey is only just beginning.
Title: Belle
